name: RoboRepair (Benbop)
description:
The "Happy Helping Friends" robot companion have a slight bug in them which made a few of them turn on there owners. There is a surplus of robots needing repair and luckily you work at the repair factory. Complete tasks and minigames to fix the robots but dont mess up or youll end up like the buyers.

90% of the game is just controlled by the mouse. It is straight forward and easy to get the hand of.

I highly recommend downloading as it has a couple extra features and the overall experience is just better. If you are playing imbedded PRESS F11 to go full screen or else the top is cut off.

This is my first gamejam as a devoper and really excited to see what people think so feedback is much appreciated!
